input.sentences: a beautiful trip with the kids to some of the more secluded areas in location . our guide introduced us to this pottery-worker .
we watched him work his magic for almost an hour !
at the end | we went and bought almost every pot you see here ! he was so excited !
the kids were more interested in the goats | though | and spent a lot of time with them after we left .
we hitched our way on a camel and rode off | that day done .
output.sentences: Le tme show you what I do for a living.
Here are a few of the things i make.
The after shot of when my pottery is finally done.
Picture of my goats just because I have goats.
Picture of my camels, bet you dont own a camel.
